body: This Scalar constructor fails when it gets a nelements=1 tensor, for ex from the Python frontend. I got around this by copying over and using `tensor_as` from https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/5298
body_html: This Scalar constructor fails when it gets a nelements=1 tensor, for ex from the Python frontend. I got around this by copying over and using tensor_as from #5298
